translation.es: Reglas para un matrimonio feliz.

translation.en: "Number six, neglect the whole world rather than each other."
translation.es: Número seis, ignoren al mundo, pero no al otro.

translation.es: Número ocho, una vez al día,

translation.en: try to say one kind or complimentary thing to your life's partner."
translation.es: intenta decirle algo lindo a tu pareja.

translation.en: -Absolutely. -Yeah, let's try it together.

translation.en: Your skin is beautiful.

translation.en: Now you say something to him.

translation.en: I'm so glad I know you, very handsome man.

translation.en: And I know you must have a very beautiful wife, and--

translation.en: -You've never met his wife? -I've never met her yet.

translation.en: Well, not... He hasn't worked here for 30 years.
translation.es: No ha trabajado aquí por 30 años.

translation.en: He's been married 30 years.

translation.en: Oh, actually, that's not the right thing to do.

translation.es: - Ojos azules hermosos. - Genial.

translation.en: And I like your very light-hearted spirit.

translation.en: Um, "Number ten, it takes two to make a quarrel

translation.en: -Yeah, that's good. -That's true.

translation.en: Can you see the benefits of committing to one person long-term?

translation.en: I can see myself actually getting married at this point.

translation.en: -Okay. Yeah. -I just... I never felt that way.
translation.es: - Bien. - Es solo que... nunca sentí eso.

translation.en: "This is somebody I care about, and now I'm not sure I can fully let them in
translation.es: Es alguien que me importa, y no estoy segura que pueda dejarlo entrar

translation.en: "It's cool. Everything's cool. I'm cool with everything,"
translation.es: Está bien. Todo está bien. Nada me molesta.

translation.en: and then I start acting like, you know,

translation.en: a ten-year-old girl that's about to, like, lose everything.
translation.es: como una niña de diez años que está por perder todo.

translation.en: Yeah, absolutely.

translation.en: And what was that like for you?

translation.en: who was my boss and we lived together, and over time...

translation.en: That, to me, is like, "Okay, you gotta get the hell out of there."

translation.en: And that was the only time I've ever lived with a man.
translation.es: Solo esa vez viví con un hombre.

translation.en: Part of being in a successful relationship,
translation.es: Parte de tener una relación exitosa,

translation.en: and certainly in a marriage, is allowing ourselves to be vulnerable,
translation.es: y por supuesto en un matrimonio, es permitirse ser vulnerable,

translation.es: Puedo mirar a una persona y decir:

translation.en: -Okay, okay. -Like their shoes.

translation.en: Mmm-hmm. And you think you would choose more wisely than you have in the past?

translation.es: - Sí, eso creo. Eso espero. - Sí.

translation.en: Or dance naked.

translation.es: Pero, para mí, trabajar en una relación a largo plazo

translation.es: Y a veces dice eso

translation.en: That, for me, is the work of marriage.

translation.es: Oye, Cookie, conoces a Rich. Dice que se casará contigo.

translation.es: Desde que nos casamos,

translation.es: lista para saludar a su esposo.
